content.name: Limited Range for Intercept/Bombard
content.description:
[h1]Description:[/h1] Normally, all assignments have a range equal to the "Max Radar Range" which is [b]40 km[/b].
But did you know, that ships with a [b]"Defend"[/b] assignment or [b]"Supply Ships"[/b] have a reduced response range of [b]20 km[/b], [b]but it only for the ships you own[/b].
This mod extends this limitation to the [b]"Intercept"[/b] and [b]"Bombard"[/b] assignments, and further reduces the response range from [b]20 km[/b] to [b]15 km[/b].
The AI will still pursue targets and charge into stations just to kill 1 lonely drone, but it should do so much closer to your fleet.
content.author: Arthur Revan
